QueryToExecute:
select
  'arn:' || partition || ':ssm:' || region || ':' || account_id || ':document/' || name as resource,
  case
    when account_ids :: jsonb ? 'all' then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  case
    when account_ids :: jsonb ? 'all' then title || ' publicly accesible.'
    else title || ' not publicly accesible.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_ssm_document
where
  owner_type = 'Self';
